attributes.action: Sort out the 'Rip Off' Insurance Premiums!
attributes.additional_details: Insurance premiums are an absolute rip off! Cars that are worth a few hundred pounds are costing thousands to insure, even on third party! This is just not fair, in a time when there is no money and people are finding ways to cut costs, this is one thing that can be sorted out and something being done about it! Hopefully it can lead to a fairer system that involves everyone paying LESS for their insurance premiums!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the insurance industry.
